original_title: Toto -  With A Little Help From My Friends
overview: With A Little Help From My Friends captures one special night on November 21, 2020 when Steve Lukather, Joseph Wil-liams and David Paich appeared with the new line-up of Toto for a global event originating from Los Angeles, CA.  Joining Lukather, Williams and Paich for this next chapter in their indelible history are new band members bassist John Pierce, drummer Robert "Sput" Searight, and keyboardist / background vocalist Steve Maggiora.
title: Toto -  With A Little Help From My Friends
